text: An almost barren tree. Not many leaves left. Snow all around, and a light snow falls as well. Watching this tree from inside a cottage is PAKHI. She's in her early twenties and pretty, but her eyes make her look much older. The wind picks up and a leaf breaks off the tree. It starts to float towards the ground. Pakhi watches the falling leaf, all the way till it hits the snow-covered ground. Overlap the soft sound of drums and woman ululating. Slowly, a title fades in on screen:
The title fades out. The leaf disappears into the snow. The drums get louder.
ON a light bulb, unlit. On this visual, a title:

Behind the bulb is the courtyard of a grand haveli. Durga pooja in progress. Woman ululate and men play the drums. A decorated statue of Durga looms over everyone. Standing amongst many people in front of the statue, dressed in finery, is Pakhi, the same age but looking years younger. Next to her stands a very dignified middle aged man. SOUMITRA ROYCHOWDHURY, the Zamindar of the haveli. The drums beat on.

On a makeshift stage in the centre of the courtyard, a jatra is being performed. Loud actors appear from the middle of the crowd, walking dramatically on stage. The audience claps, whistles and cheers. Pakhi sits in the crowd with DEVYANI, her friend. Like everyone else, they have wide smiles on their faces, fascinated by the play.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 2 She looks across the stage and sees the Zamindar, sitting with his estate manager MAJUMDAR. They're in deep conversation.
Thodi savdhaani baratne mein aap hi ka faayda hai... kanoon kabhi bhi lagoo ho sakta hai...
Apni viraasat hum nahin bechenge Majumdar...

Nahin bechna hai to trust bana leejiye... uss mein bhi waqt lagta hai. Baki sab zamindar babu log bhi yahi kar rahe hain... The Zamindar ignores him. Another loud actor enters the stage dramatically, delivering a line. Pakhi and Devyani laugh aloud. Pakhi's laugh turns into a bout of coughing, soft at firs but gradually becoming more persistent. Devyani doesn't notice at first but then she does. The Zamindar also notices.
The Zamindar and Devyani hurriedly help Pakhi through a corridor. She's breathing with a lot of difficulty.
They carry her into her room and place her on an armchair A MAID follows them in.
Kya hua?
Dr. Guha ko bulvaiye...
The jatra is still on. DR. GUHA, a balding middle aged man, walks past it and into the haveli.
Guha walks up the staircase and finds the Zamindar waitin for him.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 3 They walk together.
Apni Pakhi ko baar baar iss haalat mein hum dekh nahin sakte Guha...
Dama hai Zamindar Babu... Jaanleva tab hoga jab hum bagal mein na ho...

Dr. Guha enters and goes straight to Pakhi. He opens his bag and a syringe and vial emerge. The zamindar, Devyani and the maid watch as the doctor fills the syringe, takes Pakhi's arm and injects it. Very gradually, Pakhi's breathing comes back to normal. She reaches out a hand in the direction of the Zamindar. He comes over to her and takes it.
Pakhi sleeps, still wearing her durga pooja clothes. It's silent now. The celebration is over. The Zamindar watches her sleep, fanning her at the same time, lost. He then notices her smiling.
Pakhi? Her smile disappears.
Pakhi bete... She opens her eyes, smiles again. She sits up, still a little breathless.
Kahan kho gaye the?
Tum kab se uthi hui ho?
Mujhe uthe to dus minute ho gaye... lekin aap to aise ek tak dekhe ja rahe the... haath bhi, aise... She imitates him holding the fan.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 4
Pankha jhal raha tha... buth ki tarah... The Zamindar smiles.
Abhi kaisa lag raha hai...
(imitates him) Achcha lag raha hai... The Zamindar hits her arm with the fan. Pakhi makes a face.
(concerned) Laga kya? She looks at him and smiles again.
Maine tumhe kabhi bheel raja ki kahani sunayi hai? Pakhi shakes her head.

Bahut pahle bheelon ka ek raja hota tha... bahut taakatvar... koi usse maar nahin sakta tha. Sab darrte the usse... sainkdon baar angrezon ne inke jungalon mein dhava bola, usse hazaaron teer maare, talwaar se kaata lekin vah marre hi na... phir unko pata chala ki iss bheel raja ne apni jaan ek tote mein rakh chhodi hai... ab lakhon tote jungle mein, kaise dhoonde iski jaan kiss tote mein hai? To unhone ek jasoos bheja. Ek sundar sa jasoos... bheel uske pyaar mein padh gaya aur shaadi kar li...ek din uss jasoos ne bhaanp liya ki kiss tote mein bheel raja ne apni jaan daal rakhi hai... phir aav dekha na taav, yoon pakda tote ko aur... (twists the neck)
Phir?
Phir vah marr gaya... Pakhi looks at him.  10 11 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 5
Beta mera tota aap ho... aur aap ko agar kuch ho gaya na, to main marr jaoonga... They look at each other. She leans forward and embraces him. Music...
The courtyard, now empty. The Zamindar and Pakhi stand on a balcony. He points out. Their POV: the light bulb is lit.
Manikpur mein bhi bijli aa gayee...
Aur rukegi kab tak? He looks at her.
Matlab? She smiles. Music builds...

The sun rises over green fields, date palms and red earth TITLE SEQUENCE BEGINS, with title cards on black intercut with visuals: - Pakhi and the Zamindar take a walk through the fields. - The women stand on a balcony of the haveli, watching the Durga Statue being taken away with much fanfare. All the OLDER WOMEN have tears rolling down their faces. Pakhi and Devyani try not to laugh. - Rain falls. Pakhi, in her room, sits by a window and writes in her notebook. - Pakhi and Devyani stand on the terrace of the haveli in the rain, watching grey clouds roll in, standing close together to battle the strong breeze. - The sun shines again.  12 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 6 Pakhi and her father take a walk through the fields. They stand by the car and watch the setting sun under a crimson sky. MAIN TITLES END.

A motorcycle chugs it way down a rural road. Driving it is a young man. VARUN SHRIVASTAV. Coming down the other end and taking up most of the road is the Zamindar's car. Inside the car: Pakhi drives. The DRIVER sits next to her, very nervous. Devyani sits in the back, on the edge of her seat.
Sadak ka baanya taraf pakad kar chaliye... dheema chaliye... bhida gaya to samasya ho jaayegi... Pakhi looks at him, glee on her face.
Bhida gaya to aapne bhidaaya, nahin bhida to hum chala rahe the...

Arre dekh ke... naukri se barkhast karvaayengi humko... Varun slows down his motorcycle, looking at a lane going off. He speeds up again, reaches into his shirt and takes out a small note. He reads it as he drives. As Pakhi rounds a curve, she swings the car from side to side. Devyani gets thrown around the back seat. The driver hangs on for dear life. Pakhi laughs. She doesn't notice Varun's motorcycle approaching. And Varun doesn't see the car approaching, swaying from side to side, till it's pretty close. The driver notices Varun.

(pointing) Pakhi Di... Pakhi sees Varun and she screams. In panic, she lets go of the steering wheel.  13 14 15 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 7 The car veers towards Varun, who has no option but to take evasive action... and fly into a ditch. Pakhi hits the brakes. The car screeches to a stop. They all look back. Varun is nowhere to be seen.
Kahan gaya?
Yamraaj ke dvaare gaya aur kahan jaayega... Devyani looks at Pakhi.
Gaadi ke neeche? Pakhi opens the door.
Paapad ban gaya hoga usska aur kya...

Pakhi, Devyani and the driver stand by the ditch. Pakhi's POV: Varun, unconscious, bleeding from his forehead. Very still. As they watch, he moves, very slightly. Pakhi and Devyani breathe massive sighs of relief. Pakhi looks at him, for a few seconds longer than necessa as he opens his eyes.
The car drives by. The driver drives. Varun sits in the front seat, holding a handkerchief over the bleeding wound above his eye.
Galti hamaari thi bhaiya... hum hi bhidaaye. Didi to bas handle thaame thi... Pakhi sits at the back, watching the back of Varun's head

Dr. Guha examines the wound above Varun's eye. In the outer room, Pakhi and Devyani watch through the crack in the door.  16 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 8 Pakhi observes Varun for a while. She then comes to his jacket lying on a table, starts to look through it.
Tum kya kar rahi ho?
Shhhbh.... Pakhi removes an envelope from inside the jacket pocket. It bears the stamp of the Archaeological Survey of India and is addressed to Zamindar Roy Chowdhury. Pakhi smiles.
Doctor chacha aa rahe hain... Pakhi hurriedly puts the letter back. Dr Guha steps out.
Bete aap log ghar jaao... usse kuch nahin hua hai, theek ho jaayega... Pakhi nods. Dr Guha returns to the chamber and shuts the door. Pakhi's eyes meet Varun's as the door closes.
Dr. Guha turns to Varun. And smiles, holding up a bottle.
Tincher iodine... charcharaayega... He reaches for Varun's wound. Varun closes his eyes.
Pakhi and Devyani reach the car when they hear Varun shou in pain. They look back. Pakhi smiles to herself. The driver shakes his head.
Bechaara... Pakhi looks at him. Indicates that he should vacate the driver's seat.
Sarakiye...
Kaahe?  17 18 19 Lootera Shooting Draft vl
Ek to bechaare motorcycle vaale ko naale mein dhakelte ho, gaadi chalaana nahin aata, aur poochte ho kaahe?
Hum dhakele?
Nahin to kya hum? His face falls. He moves to the passenger seat.
Aayiye...
A strong breeze hits Pakhi's face as she drives back. The car races by fields now lit by the late afternoon sun.
Pakhi switches the lightbulb on and off, fascinated by the mechanism.
Pg 9 17 18 19 The Zamindar looks at the lightbulb being unscrewed by an electrician. Majumdar stands next to him.
Aap baar baar mazaak samajh kar taal dete hain. Zamindari unmoolan ka kanoon aaj, kal, kabhi bhi lagoo ho gaya to daanye haath ko baanya bhi nahin milaga malne ke liye...
(to the electrician) Kya kharaabi aa gayee thi uss mein?
Iska paleeta udd gaya tha... kissi ne bahut bandbujh kiya hai iske saath...
Paleeta?
Tantuk... andar hota hai jisse roshni hoti hai...  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 10
Bijli se nahin hoti roshni?
Bijli se paleeta jalta hai jisse roshni hoti hai...
Hahn, pata hai... vah jo bhi hota hai, poori haveli mein lagvaana hai... jo bhi kharcha aayega Majumdar sahab ko di deejiyega... He smiles at Majumdar. He walks.
(to the electrician) Aur vah kya bola tha? Paleeta ka doosra naam?
Tantuk...
Tantuk... achcha hai... Majumdar follows him.
Aap zara bhi gambhir nahin hai... aapko samajh mein nahin aa raha ha ki kuch nahin bachega aapke paas adhiniyam lagoo ho gaya to...
Ye kanoon kabhi nahin lagoo hoga.

Hoga. Sarkar mein na to maharaajein baithe hain na zamindar, jo aapki vakaalat karenge. Vah jog baithe hain jinki aankh mein tabhi se kirkiri hai jab vah aapke neeche paida hue... yah log prajatantra ke naye zamindar hain. Pandrah acre zameen se ek dhela zyaada nahin rakhne denge aapko...
Koi baat nahin... pandrah acre hi sahi...
Aur kamaai kahan se aayegi?
Pandrah acre ka to lagaan aayega.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 11

Zamindar khatam lagaan hazam Babuji... khud hi khet jotna padega, aur agar jutvaaoge to tankhwa deni padegi... They walk on, still arguing. Pakhi and Devyani sit in a room above, listening to the conversation.
Hamaare baba hamesha aapas mein bahas kyon karte hain?
Pata nahin... mere baba ko lagta hai Zamindar Babu samajhte nahin hain, aur Zamindar Babu ko lagta hai mere baba aise hi bakte rahte hain...
Kya bakte hain? Before Devyani can answer, both of them hear the sound of an approaching motorcycle. They look at each other, and get up quickly. They come to the balcony. Devyani nudges Pakhi.

Udhar... Pakhi looks. Her POV: Varun stands at the entrance to the haveli, looking for some assistance. A bandage is plastered over his eye. He pulls the rope for the old bell. A servant walks up to him. Pakhi watches Varun as he talks to the servant.
Kahiye...
Mera naam Varun Shrivastav hai...
Kaun jagah se padhaar rahe hain?
Archaeological Survey of India, Delhi...  20 21 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 12 The servant looks at Varun, tongue tied, finding it too hard to assimilate. Varun gives him a letter.
Yahin rukiye... Pakhi watches the servant walk up to the Zamindar and Majumdar.
Dilli ke aajal savediya se aaye hain...
Kahan se?
Angrezi jagah hai... He hands the Zamindar the letter. As Pakhi watches, the servant comes back to Varun and leads him to the Zamindar. They shake hands.
The Zamindar looks through books on the shelf. Pakhi walks with him.

Archaeologist hai... hamaari mandir ki zameen ke chaaron taraf khudai karna chahte hain... kahta hai koi puraani civilisation dabi padi hai hamaari zameen ke neeche. Pakhi looks at her father, waiting for more information. He finds the book he was looking for and pulls it out of the shelf. Walks away from her.
Raat ko khaane pe aa raha hai, khud hi pooch lena... Pakhi smiles. Music...
Pakhi sits in front of the mirror. She's dressed in a beautiful sari. Her hair is done up and so are her eyes. She looks at the clock in the mirror. Almost 8 o clock.
22 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 13
A clock strikes 8. Varun sits on a large chair at the foot of the stairs. He hears a voice behind him.
Varun Shrivastav...
(turns to look) Ji...
Peeche mat dekhna... He looks back in front.
Jis gaadi se aaj aapki takkar hui usse chalaane vaale ka naam Babu Singh tha...
Ji... aur aapka naam kya hai?
Zyaada hoshiyar banne ki koshish mat karo kyonki tum ho nahin...
Ji aap un dono mein se kaun vaali hain? There's no response. He turns to look. There's nobody there.
Mr. Shrivastav... Varun looks. The Zamindar is walking down the stairs. Varun stands. The Zamindar walks up to him, shakes his hand. He points to Pakhi, who seems to have magically appeared behind.
Ye hamari beti hai... Pakhi...
Ji...
Aur Pakhi bete, ye hai vah gentleman jinke baare mein...
Namaste...  23 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 14
The Zamindar and Varun sit at the dining table. Pakhi supervises the servants in setting dinner.
Likhna chahti hai hamari beti. vaise, likhti burra nahin hai... hamari library ki har kitaab par apna naam likh rakha hai...
She looks at him, mortified.
Baba... He smiles at her fondly.
Hum achcha likhte hain...
(polite) I'm sure... kaafi kam bolti hain aap Pakhi ji...
Ji...
(to Varun) Archaeologists... mujhe hamesha lagta tha ki koi umradaraaj... puraane jang lage log hote honge... jo makdee ke jhalon mein apni jeevika dhondte hain...
Shayad isiliye hamaare department ko puraatan vibhaag kaha jaata hai... The Zamindar laughs. Varun smiles.
Food is being taken away. Pakhi stands and serves the Zamindar hot coffee.
(to Varun) Rah kahan rahe ho tum?
Circuit house mein... mandir ke paas hai...  24 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 15
Yah apna maatha kahan phod liya?
Meri motorcycle ki ek gaadi se mutbhed huyi thi...
Manikpur mein?
Ji...
Kaun chala raha tha?
Main hi chala raha tha...
Dono ek saath chalaaoge to phir mutbhed to hogi hi... Varun smiles. Pakhi controls her laughter. She moves to serve Varun.
Main motorcycle chala raha tha...
Of course...

Aur gaadi pata nahin, koi nauseekhiya chala raha tha... itni chaudi sadak par ek itni si motorcycle... phir bhi ussi mein bhidaane ja raha tha... inn andhe nauseekhiya ko gaadi kyon koi chalaane deta hai meri samajh mein nahin aata... Pakhi suddenly pours hot coffee on Varun's hand. He shout out in pain.
Sorry sorry... (to the servant) Jaldi thanda paani layiye...
The Zamindar pours himself a drink, and another for Varun who sits in an armchair, his hand bandaged with tumeric. Pakhi looks among the books in the shelves.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 16
Shukra hai tum iski coffee ke neeche aaye, kyonki vah gaadi jisse tum bhide the agar ye chala rahi hoti to phir shayad haath bacha hi nahin hota jalne ke liye... The Zamindar hands Varun his glass.

(placing a record) Ek baar baitha tha main is nauseekhiya ke bagal mein... hum log bazaar ki taraf gaye... jaisa hamesha hota hai, hamaari gaadi dekhte hi log jhuk ke pranaam karne lag gaye. Unko dekh kar hamaari Pakhi bhi jhuk jhuk ke jawaab dene lagi... aur gaadi seedha aata chakki mein. Kaali gaadi safed vaapas aa gayee... Varun laughs.
Agli baar baithna seedha khaai mein le jaakar utaaroongi... saari Zamindari bhool jaaoge... The Zamindar goes towards his grammaphone, chooses a record.
Sarkar ne aapko pata hai na, Zamindar unmoolan aayog baithaaya hai... kabhi bhi kanoon lagoo ho sakta hai... The Zamindar doesn't answer.
Matlab?

Kanoon ban gaya to Zamindaron ka sab kuch rashtriya khazaanon mein chala jaayega... (to the Zamindar) Is se pahle ki sab jabt ho jaaye, agar aap apni viraasat bechna chahe to main aise kuch khareedaar jaanta hoon. Jinse aksar hamaare department ka kaam chalta hai... achchi keemat bhi dete hain aur moonh bhi band rakhte hain... Music starts playing. Varun trails off, realising that he's being ignored. The music grows...  25 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 17

Varun walks between shelves of books, rows upon rows, looking at the immense collection. He comes back to the sitting area and sees Pakhi reading to the Zamindar from a book. He listens to the sound of her voice and the music.

Kai dinon tak chulha roya, chhaki rahi udaas... kai dinon tak kaani kuttiya soi unke paas... kai dinon tak lagi bheet par chhipkaliyon ki gasht... kai dinon tak choohon ki bhi haalat rahi shikast... Varun then starts mouthing the words along with Pakhi. The Zamindar looks at him.

Daane aaye ghar ke andar kayi dinon ke baad... dhuan utha aangan se oopar kayi dinon ke baad... chamak uthi ghar bhar ki aankhen kai dinon ke baad... kauve ne khujlaayi pankhen kayi dinon ke baad... Silence...
Baba Nagarjun... asli naam Vaidhnath Mishra... Mere nanihaal Darbhanga ke rahne vaale the... Pakhi looks at him. The Zamindar clears his throat.
Tumne kya bataya tha, kahaan rah rahe ho tum?

A servant walks carries Varun's bags into the outhouse courtyard. Varun follows him, and behind Varun walks another young man, DEBDAS, who carries his own heavy bags They stop in the courtyard and look around - a simple, small courtyard with lots of rooms. The balcony of the main house surrounds them from all sides. The servant unlocks one of the rooms and takes their bags inside.
Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 18

Aapne kaafi asar jamaya hai Varun Babu... uss badboodaar circuit house ki jagah ye shaandaar haveli... Varun smiles. From inside her room, Pakhi has a perfect view of the outhouse courtyard. She watches Varun and Deb checking out their room. She smiles to herself.
Old temple ruins, some broken, some intact, in the middle of a dusty field. The Zamindar walks with Varun, Deb, Majumdar and Pakhi following close behind. Pakhi watches Varun more than often.

Ye jagah paanch sau saalon se vaisi ki vaisi hi hai. Na to humne kissi ko yahaan kuch banaane diya hai na bigaadne. Jo saaf safaai hoti rahi hai vah Majumdar sahab ke saamne hoti hai, aur inke pahle inke Pitaji ki dekhrekh mein hoti thi... They come to the centre temple. Recently made iron gates and padlocks cover the entrance to the interior. Inside is a beautiful idol of Kali.
Aur ye Kali ki murti Roychowdhury khaandaan ki dharohar hai... kam se kam teen sau saal puraani hai... Varun pulls out a camera from the case slung over his shoulder.
Main dekh sakta hoon?
Of course... Varun gets closer to the temple, frames and clicks. He then lowers the camera and looks at the idol, carefull
26 27 28 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 19

In the courtyard of the haveli, a movie projector is set up and beams it's images onto a makeshift screen. Varun, Deb and the Zamindar's close ones watch the film sitting on chairs, while a host of villagers watch the film while sitting on the floor. Varun leans closer to Deb.
Kuch samajh mein aa raha hai Debdas Mukherjee?
Sab kuch samajh mein aa raha hai... mere Ma Babuji aise hi baat karte hain... Varun smiles, and looks away. His eyes meet Pakhi's. They smile at each other and then look back at the screen
(not taking his eyes off the screen) Bangali seekh lo, abhi nahin to kabhi na kabhi seekhna padega...

Early morning light streams into Pakhi's room. She sits by the window, peeping out into the outhouse courtyard. Her POV: Varun shaves and Deb tunes his radio. After many strange noises it finally tunes itself to the right frequency - Geeta Dutt singing "Tadbeer Se Bigdi Hui". Deb beams, starts swaying to the music. Pakhi smiles, then walks over to her own radio and tunes it to the same song. She returns to the window and looks out.
Varun looks at Deb doing his jig, razor in hand.
Baazi dekhi hai tumne? Varun shakes his head.  29 30 31 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 20

Dekhi chahiye tumhe... isse kahte hai picture. Dev Anand number ek ka juaari hai iss mein. Aur kya hota hai, ek samay aisa aata hai... ki usse chunna hai. Bahut saara paisa aur uski bahan ki zindagi... ya sab kuchh chhod de sirf pyar ke liye... dekhna chahiye kya karta hai vah... aur kya ladta hai... aisa khada hokar... Deb stands, legs apart, torso crouched down.
Saamne se jitne chaahe lampat aa jaaye, majaal hai ki uske baalon ka style bigad jaaye... Varun washes his face.
Aur iss picture ka nirdeshak naya aadmi hai, koi Guru Dutt... naam suna hai?
Nahin.
Sunoge... ek din... har koi sunega... The song continues...
The Zamindar's car drives past green fields, kicking up red earth. A few people bow down to the car as it passes by. Varun and Deb follow on the motorcycle.

The Zamindar breaks the ceremonial coconut at the digging site. Pakhi, Varun, Majumdar, Devyani and Deb applaud, as do the villagers assembled. Milk is poured on the idol of Kali as the priests perform a pooja.
32 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 21 Varun talking to Deb. Majumdar stands with them.
(pointing) Yah dono mandir ke beech ki jo jagah hai, hum yahaan khudaai karenge... (points elsewhere) Idhar hamaara camp lagega... Deb nods. Varun turns to Majumdar.
Aur kuch mazdooron ki zaroorat padegi hamein... milenge?
Fifteen labourers sit in the sun. Deb stands in front of them.
Aap logon ko yahaan khudaai karni hai, kya karna hai...
Khudaai...
To... (imitating Dev Anand) Phir savaal ye hai ki... aapko khodna aata hai? The labourers look at each other.
Sahib, yah kudaal kaahe ke liye laaye hain... khodne ke liye hi
to laaye...
Very good...
Hum khod kyon rahe hain?
Hum khod rahe hain kyonki zameen hai, usse... khodte hain...
Matlab andar kuchau dabal hai ki bas gadhha banana hai?
Andar hi to hai jo hai... baahar to sirf... He looks around, sees Majumdar looking at him silently. 32  33 34 35
36 37 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 22
Vah... bhai mujhe nahin pata... bade saahab ko pata hai... He walks on, past Majumdar.
Ye theek hai...
Music continues... The Zamindar, Varun and Pakhi sit at the dinner table. Animated conversation between Varun and the Zamindar. Pakhi watches them.

Varun explains to the labourers what they are supposed to do, how to dig down in a straight line, how to collect the earth and where to keep it. Deb supervises the erection of the tents. Tables, chairs and other paraphernalia go under them. Music continues.
Pakhi and Varun animatedly read to the Zamindar from a book.
Varun constructs a wooden frame and stretches a painting canvas across it. He sets up the canvas on an easel. Deb watches him. From her room, So does Pakhi.
Varun shaves while Deb does another jig to the song. From the house, Pakhi watches, smiling. Varun and Deb laugh.
Varun finishes writing a letter and puts it into a large envelope along with a photograph of the idol. He addresses the letter to "Mr. R Bajpai" He gives it to Deb.  38
39 40 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 23

The zamindar reads a newspaper, very seriously. We see the headline - "The End of Zamindari. Estates and Acquisitions Act Passed." He puts the newspaper down and looks at Majumdar across the table. Radio Song ends. Overlap a radio broadcast about the Zamindar Abolition Act.
In the fields, villagers celebrate.
The Zamindar and Majumbar stand on the terrace of the haveli, looking at the celebrations.
Sab bahut khush hai...
Sab nahin...
A motorcade of three cars makes it's way through the streets of Bengal.
The motorcade enters the Zamindar's peaceful and green farmhouse.
The Zamindar looks out of the car at the passing orchard. Pakhi sits next to him.
Yah bageecha bhi le jaayenge?
Hahn...
Lekin le jaake karenge kya?
Baant denge gaon vaalon mein... sab muft ke aam khaayenge...  4l Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 24
The Zamindar sits at the edge of the pond, holding a fishing rod. Servants around him wait, some bored, some fidgety. Varun and Deb sit under a tree, watching the Zamindar.
Ustad Allahrakha tabla baja rahe hain pet mein... maare gud gud ke haalat kharab hai...
Pahli rohu jab tak kaanta nahin kaategi, tabla bajta rahega... parampara janaab...
(imitating the Zamindar ) Of course... Tab tak to Vilayat Khan bhi bajaana shuru kar denge...
Under another tree, Pakhi and Devyani:
Zamindari hamari khatam hui hai, machliyan kyon maatam mana rahi hai... itna hi dukh hai unko to Baba ke kaante par jaan kyon nahin de deti... She looks from her father to Varun. Devyani notices.
